questions: Q. 1. What is the importance of using manure and fertilizers as an agricultral practice ?
answers: Ans. Using manure and fertilizers as an agriculture practice is important as continous growth of crops makes the soil poorer in certain nutrients. These both are added to the soil in the form of nutrients for the healthy growth of plants. Manure replenishes the soil with nutrients and also improves water retaining capacity whereas fertilizers make soil rich in a particular nutrient. They also help farmers to get better yield of crops.
